4.21.19  11:29 pm   Dating advice?

     the number gets 1 lower; the day of the week gets one later, from year to year except leap years then it's 2. march and feb are identical in non leap years. jan and october are identical in non leap years. the double 31s are within the middle of northern summer, and over new years. christmas is exactly 1 week before new years. no one alive can actually figure out when easter is on their own, and one day that knowledge will be lost and we won't be able to find easter

     why would you

4.21.19  10:59 pm   what is the meaning of lid

     i'm not sure

4.21.19  10:39 pm   4.21.19  1:25 am what do you mean by improvising the lyrics?

     making them up as you go along

      For your own songs? Other songs? Any songs?

     you could make up a totally new song, or you could start with an existing song and then do it all wrong/different

      And what do you find beneficial about this?

     that's when you discover what your singing voice can really do. real life is unscripted. 99.9% of our talking is spent unscripted. it is automatically genuine when you are making it up. the 'weird challenge' is to do scripted material. even the best actors in the world still sometimes sound fake doing this. it is significantly more difficult to find a genuine voice when doing scripted material (spoken or sung) whereas the genuineness is pretty much there by default when you are making it up. for example try reading a book out loud. then compare that to how you normally sound when you are talking to real people throughout your day. you'll see which one is more genuine. unless you happen to be an awesome voice actor in which case maybe the written one might sound totally bang-awesome, but actually still probably fake. unless you've really got the seasoned touch of 1,000 ninjas

4.21.19  1:26 pm   the only time I ever come up with ideas for my content is when I'm about to go to sleep so I write them down but when I wake up and look at the ideas,,, it's so bad?? Even though I thought it was really good when I wrote them down?? Help 

     you're going to have to decide who to believe. your night time self or your morning self. the next step in the conversation is to write some response notes in the morning, responding to your night notes. then the following night, make some new night notes but also look at the previous night notes and the morning responses. bring the 2 personas into closer proximity so they can fight it out, first hand
